      • getOutputItemChances

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Float> getOutputItemChances(IMachineInventory inventory)
        Okay so there's a bit of trickery happening here - internally "unmodifiable" chance is stored as a negative. Saves some memory and is kinda clever. This shouldn't ever cause problems because you're relying on this method call and not hacking around in the recipe, right? ;)
        Specified by:
